verses.verse: "Now, <S%H3548><s%> you priests, this commandment is for you. <S%H4687><s%>

If you will not listen, <S%H8085><s%> and if you will not lay <S%H7760><s%> it to heart, <S%H3820><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> to my name, <S%H8034><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "then will I send <S%H7971><s%> the curse <S%H3994><s%> on you, <S%H779><s%> and I will curse your blessings. <S%H1293><s%> Indeed, <S%H779><s%> I have cursed them already, <S%H7760><s%> because you do not lay it to heart. <S%H3820><s%>

Behold, <S%H1605><s%> I will rebuke your seed, <S%H2233><s%> and will spread <S%H2219><s%> dung <S%H6569><s%> on your faces, <S%H6440><s%> even the dung <S%H6569><s%> of your feasts; <S%H2282><s%> and you will be taken away with it. <S%H5375><s%>

You will know <S%H3045><s%> that I have sent <S%H7971><s%> this commandment <S%H4687><s%> to you, <S%H1285><s%> that my covenant may be with Levi, <S%H3878><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"My covenant <S%H1285><s%> was with him of life <S%H2416><s%> and peace; <S%H7965><s%> and I gave <S%H5414><s%> them to him that he might be reverent <S%H4172><s%> toward me; <S%H3372><s%> and he was reverent toward me, <S%H6440><s%> and stood in awe <S%H2865><s%> of my name. <S%H8034><s%>

The law <S%H8451><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> was in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> was not found <S%H4672><s%> in his lips. <S%H8193><s%> He walked <S%H1980><s%> with me in peace <S%H7965><s%> and uprightness, <S%H4334><s%> and turned <S%H7725><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

For the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s lips <S%H8193><s%> should keep <S%H8104><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and they should seek <S%H1245><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> at his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> for he is the messenger <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

But you have turned <S%H5493><s%> aside out of the way. <S%H1870><s%> You have caused many <S%H7227><s%> to stumble <S%H3782><s%> in the law. <S%H8451><s%> You have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"Therefore I have also made <S%H5414><s%> you contemptible <S%H959><s%> and base <S%H8217><s%> before all the people, <S%H5971><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to the way you have not kept <S%H8104><s%> my ways, <S%H1870><s%> but have had respect <S%H5375><s%> for persons in the law. <S%H8451><s%>

Don't <S%H259><s%> we all have one father? <S%H1><s%> Hasn't <S%H259><s%> one God <S%H410><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> us? <S%H898><s%> Why do we deal treacherously every man <S%H376><s%> against his brother, <S%H251><s%> profaning <S%H2490><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of our fathers? <S%H1><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> has dealt treacherously, <S%H898><s%> and an abomination <S%H8441><s%> is committed <S%H6213><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> and in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> for Judah <S%H3063><s%> has profaned <S%H2490><s%> the holiness <S%H6944><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> which he loves, <S%H157><s%> and has married <S%H1166><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of a foreign <S%H5236><s%> god. <S%H410><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will cut off, <S%H3772><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H5782><s%> him who wakes and him who answers, <S%H6030><s%> out of the tents <S%H168><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and him who offers <S%H5066><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

This again <S%H8145><s%> you do: <S%H6213><s%> you cover <S%H3680><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with tears, <S%H1832><s%> with weeping, <S%H1065><s%> and with sighing, <S%H603><s%> because he doesn't <S%H6437><s%> regard the offering <S%H4503><s%> any more, <S%H3947><s%> neither receives it with good will <S%H7522><s%> at your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H4100><s%> 'Why?' Because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has been witness <S%H5749><s%> between you and the wife <S%H802><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> against whom you have dealt treacherously, <S%H898><s%> though she is your companion, <S%H2278><s%> and the wife <S%H802><s%> of your covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Did he not make <S%H6213><s%> you one, <S%H259><s%> although he had the residue <S%H7605><s%> of the Spirit? <S%H7307><s%> Why one? <S%H259><s%> He sought <S%H1245><s%> a godly <S%H430><s%> seed. <S%H2233><s%> Therefore take heed <S%H8104><s%> to your spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and let no one deal treacherously <S%H898><s%> against the wife <S%H802><s%> of his youth. <S%H5271><s%>

For I hate <S%H8130><s%> divorce, <S%H7971><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "and him who covers <S%H3680><s%> his garment <S%H3830><s%> with violence! <S%H2555><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> "Therefore take heed <S%H8104><s%> to your spirit, <S%H7307><s%> that you don't <S%H898><s%> deal treacherously.

You have wearied <S%H3021><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with your words. <S%H1697><s%> Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3021><s%> 'How have we wearied him? <S%H559><s%>' In that you say, <S%H6213><s%> 'Everyone who does evil <S%H7451><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and he delights <S%H2654><s%> in them; <S%H430><s%>' or 'Where is the God of justice? <S%H4941><s%>'
